name: Verne Simulator
description:
A fan game for the Umich N.E.R.D.S musical, Kitchen Sink. Its a text based adventure made in Twine 2, in which you become Verne in order to be horny and also commit crimes (things you cannot do unless you're Verne).

Its very cursed and I spent way too long making it (most of it written in a caffeine driven delirium). There's 11 endings total, so now you may suffer as I have suffered, enjoy!

Content warnings for: mild violence, murder, (and cringe).

Note: the music doesn't work for some people who play in chrome for some reason? I have no clue why that happens, but I think it has to do with individual chrome settings rather than the game itself.

If anything else besides the music isn't working then please let me know!
